Subject: Seeking Guidance on Secure Integration for Medical Data Products

I am looking to secure the integration of medical data products and ensure the confidentiality and integrity of sensitive patient information. Could you provide guidance on how to achieve this in a hospital setting?. My contact number is +39-06-8899-1122.
